DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate Tobramycin tear concentration value TOBRADEX® Ophthalmic Suspension , Tobramycin 0.3 % / Dexamethasone 0.05 % Ophthalmic Suspension versus TOBREX® Ophthalmic Solution normal volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Visual Acuity ( VA ) 0.6 logMAR good Tear meniscus height ≥ 0.3mm Visit 1 . No concomitant topical ocular medication , include artificial tear , study period Exclusion ocular hypertension , iritis uveitis , glaucoma ocular surgery , intraocular surgery ocular laser procedure either eye within past six month epithelial herpes simplex ( dendritic keratitis ) ; Vaccinia , active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; ocular Rosacea ; Mycobacterial infection eye ; / fungal disease eye lacrimal duct obstruction , dry eye , ocular allergy . contact lens within 7 day Visit 1. ocular medication within 14 day Visit 1 .
